amendment.description: Amendment provides that the Director shall consider shortages in researchers who are members of priority populations and the number of researchers who are addressing these populations when allocating training funds.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 16 printed in the Congressional Record. to specify that the Director shall consider shortages in researchers who are members of priority populations and the number of researchers who are addressing these populations when allocating training funds.
